title: dynmap权限问题
author: Nitric_acid
txt_content:
这dynmap太**了，好多问题，我金粒都快没了
玩家无法使用/dynmap webregister指令
我已经使用了/mangaddp builder dynmap.webregister指令给予权限了
可服务器还是显示
I'm sorry, but you do not have permission to. perform this command. Please contactthe server administrators if you believe that this is in error.

replies.author: Nitric_acid
replies.txt_content: 已自行解决:使用bossshop来使用该指令来无视该权限
